entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
